regex.name: makelist
makelist2
regex.expres:
#$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,cache,workers import re
u = client.request('[makelist.param1]') u = re.findall('(?s)server_servername">([^<]*).+?f="([^"]*)', u) return u

regex.name: makelist3
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = '[makelist2.param2]'): from resources.lib.modules import client,control import re,urllib from resources.lib.modules import client import re, urllib, xbmc, xbmcgui from resources.lib.modules import control phoenixstreamer = control.cdnImport('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jaylex32/Enoch-addon/master/Files/Enochstreams.py', 'Enochstreams') phoenixstreamer = phoenixstreamer.streamer() url = phoenixstreamer.resolve(url) return url

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import cache,client,workers import re,urllib,xbmc,xbmcgui u = client.request('http://www.nzbmovieseeker.com/Toplists/') e = re.findall('(?s)class="release-wrapper">.+?f="[^"]*.+?>([^\(]*)\(([^\)]*).+?bar" id="([^"]*).+?img src="([^"]*)', u) e = [(i[0],i[1],'tt'+i[2],i[3]) for i in e] return e

regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control import re,urllib u = client.request('http://m.imdb.com/chart/top?ref_=m_nv_ch_250') e = re.findall('(?s)class="media">.+?tconst="([^"]*).+?src-x2="([^"]*).+?unbold">([^<]*).+?\n([^\n]*).+?unbold">\(([^\)]*)', u) return e

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control import re,urllib u = client.request('http://m.imdb.com/chart/moviemeter?sort=ur,desc&page=1') e = re.findall('(?s)media">.+?tconst="([^"]*).+?src-x2="([^"]*).+?h[0-9]>\s*([^<]*).+?">\(([^\)]*)', u) return e

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres:
#$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,cache,workers import re
class page: def run(self, r): threads = [] ; self.r = [] ; r = [(r.index(i)+1, i) for i in r] for i in r: threads.append(workers.Thread(self.request, i)) [i.start() for i in threads] ; [i.join() for i in threads] return ''.join([str(i[1]) for i in sorted(self.r, key=lambda x: x[0])]) def request(self, i): self.r += [(i[0], str(client.request(i[1])))]
url = [] for i in range(1, 6): url += ['http://vodly.us/movies/popular?page=' + str(i)] u = cache.get(page().run, 0, url) u = u.replace('Watch', '') u = u.replace(' /', '/') e = client.parseDOM(u, 'div', attrs = {'class': 'item-img'}) e = [(client.parseDOM(i, 'a', ret='href')[0] , client.parseDOM(i, 'a', ret='title')[0] , client.parseDOM(i, 'img', ret='src')[0]) for i in e] e = [('http://vodly.us' + i[0], i[1], 'http://vodly.us' + i[2]) for i in e] return e

regex.name: makelist2
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import re, urllib, xbmc, xbmcgui u = client.request('[makelist.param1]') e = re.findall('(?s)<tr>.+?<td>([^<]*).+?ef="([^"]*)', u) e = [(i[0],'http://vodly.us' + i[1]) for i in e] return e

regex.name: play
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import re, urllib, xbmc, xbmcgui u = client.request('[makelist2.param2]') e = client.parseDOM(u, 'div', attrs = {'class': 'wrap'}) e = (client.parseDOM(e, 'a', ret='href')[0]) return e

regex.name: dir
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = 'http://phoenixtv.offshorepastebin.com/collections/main.xml'): from resources.lib.modules import control if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.phstreams': return from resources.lib.indexers import phstreams phstreams.indexer().get(url)

regex.name: dir
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = 'http://phoenixtv.offshorepastebin.com/actors/main.xml'): from resources.lib.modules import control if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.phstreams': return from resources.lib.indexers import phstreams phstreams.indexer().get(url)

regex.name: cats
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import cache,client,workers import re,urllib,xbmc,xbmcgui u = client.request('http://www.dvdsreleasedates.com') e = re.findall('w33.+?f=\'([^\']*)\'>([^<]*)', u) e = [('http://www.dvdsreleasedates.com' + i[0] + '?sort=4&startdate=1995&enddate=2017', i[1]) for i in e if 'genre' in i[0]] return e

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import cache,client,workers import re,urllib,xbmc,xbmcgui u = client.request('[cats.param1]') e = re.findall('dvdcell.+?rc=\'([^\']*).+?\'>([^<]*).+?title\/([^\/]*)', u) e = [(i[0], i[1], i[2],i[0].split('-')[-1].split('.')[0]) for i in e] return e

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres:
#$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,cache,workers import re
u = client.request('http://www.fullmovierulz.in') u = re.findall('<li id="menu-item-\d+".+?f="([^"]*)">([^<]*)', u) u = [(i[0],i[1]) for i in u] checks = ['Home','Show', 'Privacy', 'Songs', 'Contact', 'DMCA', 'Disclaimer']; e =[] for i in u: if not any(f for f in checks if f in i[1]): e.append((i[0],i[1])) return e

.+?\W\s([^<]*).+?f="([^"]*)', u) return u

geturlcosmix
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,cache,workers import re url = '[makelist.param1]' + '/watching.html' url = client.request(url) e = re.findall('<iframe src="([^"]*)', url)[0] url2 = client.request(e) e2 = re.findall('file: \'([^\']*)', url2)[0] return e2

item.title: Latest Quality Releases [COLOR cyan](Plus RD Links)[/COLOR]

makelist
makelist2
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = '[makelist.param1]'): from resources.lib.modules import cache,client,workers import re,urllib,xbmc,xbmcgui u = client.request(url) e = re.findall('(?s)a\shref="([^"]*).+?\/\/([^.]*)', u) e = [i for i in e if 'mkv' in i[0]] e = [i for i in e if 'sample' not in i[0]] return e

regex.name: makelist
geturl
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,cache,workers import re u = client.request('[makelist.param1]') u = re.findall('<li><a href="([^"]*)">([^<]*)<\/a><\/li>', u) u = [(i[0],i[1]) for i in u if 'category' not in i[0]] checks = ['UPTOBOX','CLICKNUPLOAD','OPENLOAD','VIDTO','USERSCLOUD','UPLOADROCKET']; e =[] for i in u: if any(f for f in checks if f in i[1]): e.append((i[0],i[1])) return e

regex.name: makelist
geturl
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,cache,workers import re,base64 u = client.request('[makelist.param1]') e = re.findall('br.+?>([^<]*)', u) e = [i for i in e if 'mkv' in i] e = [(i,i.split('//')[-1].split('.')[0]) for i in e] e = [(client.replaceHTMLCodes(i[0]).encode('utf-8'), client.replaceHTMLCodes(i[1]).encode('utf-8')) for i in e] return e
